channel.title: Lost Era 562/668 Economy
channel.description:
[center][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/LE%20banner%202.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/home.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.lost-era.net"]Home[/URL] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/forums.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.lost-era.net/forum"]Forum[/URL] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/download.png[/img][URL=http://"http://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Lost%20Era%20Client.zip"]Download [/URL]
[SIZE="4"][B]Features[/B][/SIZE]:
• New Edgeville As the Home Area • Nex • Notes Tab Works 100% • Daily Updates • Proper Hp Boosts • Perfect Max and Completionist Cape Emotes. • Item disappears after being drop, over a period of time. • All Combat Hit Icons • Correct Magic GFX/Animations • Perfect Prayer System • High definition supported. • Full screen supported. • Browser based Webclient. • Correctly Done Soaking • WHAT YOU WEAR DURING COMBAT ACTUALLY MATTERS • Taste Vengence against players also npcs. • Working ancient curses against players also npcs. • All chaotic weapons. (also with correct speed and emotes) • Brand new bosses to challenge. • Clan chat with working loot share. • One click interaction. • Spirit Shields. • Clanwars safe and non-safe pking. • Bank tabs that allow you to organize your bank however you choose. • Perfected PVM/PVP • All godswords fulling working. • Dragon claws with fully working special. • All PVP armour and weapons. • New whip GFX and emotes. • All skillcapes with emotions. • High and low alchemy. • Godwars dungeon. • Fight pits minigame. • Barrows minigame. • Soul wars minigame. -Plus More!
Lost Era is a 562 loading 668 RuneScape Private Server.
[SPOILER="Media"] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/image4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/image3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/image2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i206.photobucket.com/albums/bb58/SuperPoot2007/image1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i899.photobucket.com/albums/ac195/wizzordworld/restinghome.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/screenshot18.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/screenshot13.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/screenshot8.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/screenshot7.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Comp%20Cape.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Frosts.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/screenshot6.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Hitmarks"] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Critical%20Self.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/hit.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Magic%20Icon%20Vs%20NPC.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Range%20Icon%20Vs%20NPC.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Overload.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/Korasi.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/hitmark10.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/hitmark9.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/40377508/hitmark8.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
